content: The Elder Armourworm relies mostly on its large, fat body during the fight. Expect to dodge lots of belly flops and huge swipes with the upper portion of its body. Thankfully, the Elder Armourworm is quite slow, so you should be able to dodge most attacks without too much trouble.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Elder_Armourworm_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Elder Armourworm Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Elder Armourworm Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Elder Armourworm relies mostly on its large, fat body during the fight. Expect to dodge lots of belly flops and huge swipes with the upper portion of its body. Thankfully, the Elder Armourworm is quite slow, so you should be able to dodge most attacks without too much trouble.
